short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A countdown timer designed to help you stay focused and manage time for each question. Perfect for quizzes and timed tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever run out of time during an exam? This extension helps you stay focused and manage your time effectively while studying, ensuring you stay on track and finish each question on time.

Setting the Timer (one time):
- Click the extension icon to open the popup.
- Enter your desired countdown value in the input field.

Starting and Stopping:
- Click on the extension icon, then click the "Start / Stop" button to start or stop the countdown.
(Pages opened before installing this extension may not work properly, please reload them.)

Resetting the Timer (by clicking anywhere, pressing any key):
- Click anywhere on the page or press any key (after having answers to the question) to reset the countdown.

If you find this extension helpful, please rate it 5 stars.
